channel.title: Please someone tell me how to do this!
channel.description: Ok, I want to know how someone cant do something again. Like if i they did minigame once they cant do it again. PLEASE HELP! Thanks for reading

item.title: Please someone tell me how to do this!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

OMFG SWEET IT WORKED THANKS SO MUCH!

item.title: Please someone tell me how to do this!
item.dc:creator: @KiIIer KiIIer
item.description:
@KiIIer wrote:

declare this:

public int NAME = 0;

add this to the command/object/npc that brings you to the minigame

if(NAME == 0) { //whatever you have here NAME = 1; }if(NAME == 1) sendMessage("You can't go here twice");}

search for:

} else if (token.equals("character-killcount")) { killcount = Integer.parseInt(token2);

add this under it:

} else if (token.equals("character-NAME")) { NAME = Integer.parseInt(token2);

search for:

characterfile.write("character-killcount = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(killcount), 0, Integer.toString(killcount).length()); characterfile.newLine();

add this under it:

characterfile.write("character-NAME = ", 0, 17); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(NAME), 0, Integer.toString(NAME).length()); characterfile.newLine();
NOTE: where it says "character-NAME = ", 0, 17, You must make the 17 change with the name of the int. 4 letters = 17, 5 = 18 etc.

your done.

Read full topic
